Hello from Mocander

An IT consulting company based in London, UK

Who we are

Mocander ltd is a UK based company specialising in IT consulting. The company was established in 2018 by Alex Giamas.

With a team of diverse and complementary in-house design and development skills, we can deliver ambitious projects, on time with maximum efficiency.

Skills in-house

  • User experience research (based on Gov.uk GDS principles)

  • Software architecture

  • Project management

  • Web design
  • Full stack web development
  • Mobile application development
